sentences.english: Commercial banks may not establish any account books in addition to statutory account books.
sentences.chinese: 商業銀行不得在法定的會計賬冊外另立會計賬冊。

sentences.english: Commercial banks may not establish any account books in addition to statutory account books.
sentences.chinese: 商業銀行不得在法定的會計賬冊外另立會計賬冊。

sentences.english: There are many books in this library.
sentences.chinese: 在那裏是許多賬冊在這圖書館。

sentences.english: The accountants audited the company’s books at the end of the fiscal year.
sentences.chinese: 財政年度結束時，會計師們審查公司的賬冊。

sentences.english: If their loan books go bad, the shareholders will have to stump up.
sentences.chinese: 如果他們的借貸賬冊變壞，股東就要爲此自掏腰包。
